section.title: Hosting on Sourceforge
section.p: Seagull is hosted on Sourceforge. Additional information like statistics on Seagull can be found from the Seagull's Souceforge project web page.

section.title: Source code
section.p: Seagull source code is Open Source, released under the terms of the GNU GPL license. Feel free to download it, look at it and, why not, enhance Seagull, fix bugs and send your contributions back to the user community!

ul.li: Browse Seagull source code in SVN.
Getting a copy - anonymously - of the latest source code: svn co XXXXXXX
Getting a copy - as a registered developer - of the latest source code: svn co XXXXXXX

section.title: Mailing lists
section.p: Several mailing lists are available, so that you can get the latest news on the project or ask your questions:

ul.li: Seagull announce: new releases - general info are announced on this mailing list as well on Seagull users mailing list. XXX
Seagull users: where Seagull users meet and are asking for help. XXX
Seagull commits: get a notification each time the source code changes! XXX
